Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Arbroath, Angus, Scotland, UK Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Friday, August 12, 1898; pg. 6; Issue 14080.
4 bands played. Prizes: £25, £17, £10, £5
Silver medal for euphonium: J. Thompson, Kirkcaldy Silver medal for trombone: A. Knox, Kirkcaldy
